Weekly digest

Jan 11, 2016

I decided to sum up my weekly achievements :) Mostly of my own record/pleasure/motivation.

I read:

Things to avoid when writing CSS. Part 1

Things to avoid when writing CSS. Part 2

and learnt:

  • Avoid SASS nesting
  • Avoid pixel units

I was working on creating my base site structure.
